hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.music

Class MusicFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.music.MusicFile

  • public class MusicFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Illustrates a musicfile, the class only contains a Clip object but just makes it easier to use. The musicfile can only be of type '.wav'.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MusicFile(java.lang.String path, MusicHandler handler, double volume, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a MusicFile and adds itself to a MusicHandler.

      Returns the clip that the MusicFile is actually representing

      Gives the current volume the MusicFile is playing on

      Returns the name of the MusicFile

      Mutes the sound.

      Adjusts the volume to the standerd volume.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MusicFile

        public MusicFile(java.lang.String path,
                 MusicHandler handler,
                 double volume,
                 java.lang.String name)
        Creates a MusicFile and adds itself to a MusicHandler.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        handler - the MusicHandler this MusicFile should be added to
        volume - the standerd volume the sound should have (50 is normal)
        name - the name of the MusicFile
